text: "Wherever You Are" is a song recorded by American country music artist Jack Ingram. ==Music video== The music video was directed by David McClister and premiered in January 5, 2006. It features Jack performing in different locations including a desert, a garage, and in a room with purple lights. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of February 16, 2006. ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:Jack Ingram songs
title: Wherever You Are
